In 2004 , a local group of watershed stakeholders developed a plan to restore and protect the surface waters of the Little Arkansas River watershed .

The main goal of their Watershed Restoration and Protection Strategy ( WRAPS ) is to encourage farmers to minimize atrazine loss from crop fields , thereby reducing atrazine runoff to surface waters to levels that meet water quality standards .
